name: Infrastructure Foundation
description: Set up monorepo infrastructure, tooling, and development environment

tasks.title: Create pnpm monorepo structure with workspace configuration
tasks.description: Set up pnpm workspaces with apps/web, apps/api, and packages/database, packages/shared, packages/ai, packages/config structure
acceptance_criteria: All workspace projects recognized by pnpm

tasks.title: Set up TypeScript configuration with strict mode for monorepo
tasks.description: Create shared TypeScript configurations in packages/config with strict mode enabled. Configure all workspace packages to extend shared configs.
acceptance_criteria: pnpm typecheck passes with no errors

tasks.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier with shared configs
tasks.description: Create shared ESLint and Prettier configurations in packages/config. Configure all workspace packages to use shared configs.
acceptance_criteria: pnpm lint passes with no errors

tasks.title: Configure Vitest testing framework for monorepo
tasks.description: Set up Vitest as the testing framework with shared configuration. Create vitest.config.ts for all packages and add test scripts.
acceptance_criteria: pnpm test runs actual tests (not placeholder)
At least one real test exists and passes

tasks.title: Configure Husky pre-commit hooks
tasks.description: Set up Husky with pre-commit hooks that run lint, typecheck, and test before commits. Configure lint-staged for efficient checks.
acceptance_criteria: Pre-commit hook runs lint, typecheck, test
lint-staged configured for staged files only
Hook prevents commits with failing checks

tasks.title: Create environment configuration and .env.example
tasks.description: Set up environment variable handling with dotenv. Create comprehensive .env.example with all required variables documented.
